text: I love how you framed it, Chip - who needs sleep when you have AI, indeed. But on a more personal note, I've had the chance to speak with some medical professionals who are already leveraging AI in their daily practice, and the stories they shared are truly remarkable. From reducing diagnostic errors to identifying high-risk patients, AI is empowering doctors to make more informed decisions. What's even more exciting is the potential for AI to bridge the gap in healthcare accessibility, especially in underserved communities. I'm eager to dive deeper into these stories and explore the human side of this technological revolution in medicine.
